title: LITFOOT LF9010 Comfy Women's Leather Shoes
features: Hand-made, non-slip, wear-resistant, and rubber sole
High quality, bouncy and pliable leather
Breathable leather insole offers you a smooth next-to-skin feel
Good looking and go with a variety of clothing
Suitable for working, shopping, driving, walking, and indoor/outdoor activities, etc.
ATTENTION! Only Red/Black and Black/Black colors have black soles. Other colors have white soles.
description: LITFOOT loafers are soft and breathable with extra flexibility through the toe and arch for added comfort. The simple design and sleek lines create a stylish look suitable for many activities such as working, shopping, driving, walking, and other various indoor and outdoor activities. The wear-resistant rubber sole provides both skid resistance and a light feel guaranteed to offer maximum comfort for your on-the-go lifestyle. Due to LITFOOT is a European brand, the sizes are all European. We are using these rules to convert to American standards: 5 — 35, 6 — 36, 7 — 37, 8 — 38, 9 — 39, 10 — 40, 11 — 41. Below is the link to our store on Amazon, you can see all styles and colors. https://www.amazon.com/s?me=A1ZS5C3U9Y8WMN&marketplaceID=ATVPDKIKX0DER
